Articles.Content:
Hail fellow Kerbals !

I'm Jawstin, I play KSP since the 0.22 update, but I've only achieved Apollo style mission to the Mun and some docking (which I'm proud of). Also tried space plane but I'm more of the ones that want something to look good and to work, so I have never been satisfied by the results....

I'm not really crazy about mods but since last week, me and some of my friends had the idea of a Mission Control Party using KMP and Telemachus.

But first of all we need to learn some physics and stop going by the "Disregard Physics, acquire flight !" moto... So here I'm !

(By the way, english is not my native language, so don't go raging on my grammar like I'm some docking port )

Enjoy your flight fellow Kerbals !
Welcome aboard, Jawstin! The International forums might be for you! What is your native language?
Hello and welcome to the forums!
Thank you for the link ! I'm french
